name: Njorun's Will
description:
DESIGNED AS 2-PLAYER CO-OP

Co-op mode for 2 players is not a supplementary or optional way of playing Njorun's Will - it is rather the only intended way to do it. All the game mechanics and experiences are designed and built with "co-opness" in mind.

TELEKINETIC ABILITIES

Playing as Kæra Scouts, you can telekinetically manipulate each other as well as various objects in the game. Use this power to overcome the obstacles and help each other.

CHALLENGING COMBAT

Study the enemies and coordinate your actions to be victorious in fights. Mistakes are costly, resources are limited.

EXPLORATION AND INVESTIGATION

Your primary goal is to solve the mystery. Observe the surroundings, explore the houses and dungeons, talk to strangers. Find the answers.

PLATFORMING AND PUZZLES

You will need to perform high-precision movements and jumps to traverse the locations. At times, moving forward won't be possible without scratching your head and solving a puzzle.
